## Expected Behavior

Samples provided in documentation should work
## Actual Behavior
Samples provided in documentation should work

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1. Temporal documentation ask us to refer to https://github.com/temporalio/samples-server/tree/main. But its mTLS and authorization configurations doesnt work. Try to checkout the code and try to build it as per the read me. All of them fails as they are not compatible with new temporal.

title: Outdated samples
